Review_title: This is actually a three part series
Review_Text: With a total run time of almost 2 1/2 hours. The title shown here is part 1. Pt two is called home planet and pt 3 is called the rise of nature. The story is the same as it's listed here. But it's longer than one ep and longer than one hour.

Review_title: A collection of segments from other David Attenborough documentaries
Review_Text: This is a meta-documentary, comprised of segments from other David Attenborough documentaries. IncludingGreat Barrier Reef with David Attenborough (2015),Galapagos: Nature's Wonderland (2014),David Attenborough's Conquest of the Skies 3D (2015),David Attenborough's Natural History Museum Alive (2014), andRise of Animals: Triumph of the Vertebrates (2013). They have attempted to create new documentaries based on themes, e.g. Home Planet. But, I failed to see the relationship between the episode titles and their content. Nevertheless, the segments are all pulled from other wonderful documentaries and each episode is enjoyable to watch. I would encourage viewers to seek out the original source material. I rated this title a basic 7, as there is nothing original in the content.
